contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Fauvillers |picture= |picture=Fauvillers JPG00.jpg |picture-legend=Fauvillers: church of the Sacred Heart (1877) |map=Fauvillers Luxembourg Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Fauvillers in Luxembourg province |arms= |flag= |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LX}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Bastogne|Bastogne]] |nis=82009 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Nicolas Stilmant |majority=CONTAC |postal-codes=6637 |telephone-area=063 |web=[http://www.fauvillers.be/ www.fauvillers.be] |lat_deg=49 |lat_min=51 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=40 }} '''Fauvillers''' ([[German language|German]]: ''Feitweiler'', [[Luxembourgish language|Luxembourgish]]: ''Fäteler'', [[Walloon language|Walloon]]: ''Faiviè'') is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] of [[Belgium]] located in the [[Luxembourg (Belgium)|province of Luxembourg]]. On 1 January 2007 the municipality, which covers 74.11 km², had 2,071 inhabitants, giving a [[population density]] of 27.9 inhabitants per km². ==References== {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Municipalities in Luxembourg}} [[Category:Municipalities of Luxembourg (Belgium)]] {{LuxembourgBE-geo-stub}}
